text: I'm trying to collect data from a websocket using the HTTP package, the websocket automatically disconnects every 24 hours though. Does anyone have any suggestions for keeping the connection (i.e. reconnecting) so I don't miss any of the data updates and can collect data for weeks on end rather than just for a day for example?

text: It's probably the server deciding to disconnect you due to inactivity. You could try 1) sending periodic websocket pings and see if that fixes it, or 2) wrap the whole thing in a retry loop so it reconnects on disconnect
